sqlMap.insert: /* sample2DAO.insertSample2_S */ /* 코드생성팀 이백행 SAMPLE2 등록 */ INSERT INTO SAMPLE2 ( ID , NAME , DESCRIPTION , USE_YN , REG_USER ) VALUES ( #id# , #name# , #description# , #useYn# , #regUser# )
sqlMap.update: /* sample2DAO.updateSample2_S */ /* 코드생성팀 이백행 SAMPLE2 수정 */ UPDATE SAMPLE2 SET ID = #id#, NAME = #name#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, USE_YN = #useYn#, REG_USER = #regUser# WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: /* sample2DAO.deleteSample2_S */ /* 코드생성팀 이백행 SAMPLE2 삭제 */ DELETE FROM SAMPLE2 WHERE ID = #id#
